headline: PSEG Long Island Tops the J.D. Power 2025 Business Customer Satisfaction Study in the East Large Segment
summary: PSEG Long Island has been ranked the highest in customer satisfaction among business customers in the East Large Segment, according to the J.D. Power 2025 Electric Utility Business Customer Satisfaction StudySM. The honor caps off an 11-year rise from the bottom of the survey rankings when PSEG Long Island took over operation of the electric grid.
